column1: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) about MotoPay
GENERAL
1. What is MotoPay?
MotoPay is a versatile digital bank offering seamless scan-to-pay methods for bill payments,
social connectivity, free calls and chats, convenient online shopping, and unprecedented access
to a wide range of shops.
2. How does MotoPay work?
MotoPay simplifies transactions for both merchants and users. Simply download the app on
your smartphone to access personalized bank accounts and a QR code, enabling faster and
easier transactions.
3. Is MotoPay safe to use?
MotoPay prioritizes security and has an end-to-end encryption system. Yes, It is safe to use.
4. What do I get if I refer someone on MotoPay?
MotoPay's referral program offers a balanced allocation of 1000 Naira to each participant, with
the initiative set to run for six months post-launch.
5. What is the secret of MotoPay?
The secret of Motopay is to provide fast, safe, seamless and reliable banking service and making
sure that customers have access to affordable products and services like never before. In short,
MotoPay is the cheapest place to transact.
6. Does MotoPay provide rewards or loyalty programs for users?
MotoPay offers rewards and incentives to users including cashbacks, discounts, and exclusive
offers. Additionally, MotoPay compensates you for both signing up and making purchases.
7. Does MotoPay charge any fees for transactions?
Most services are free for MotoPay users, and any payments made through our platform are
offered at competitive prices.
8. Can I buy data on MotoPay?
Yes, MotoPay allows you to easily access cost-effective airtime and data, surpassing all other
alternatives.
9. What else can I do on MotoPay?
With MotoPay, you have access to private jet reservations at competitive rates as well as private
car hire services, hotels, loans, shops, pay bills, etc. Also, you can streamline your business
operations across all branches.
10.What is the unique selling point of MotoPay?
MotoPay adopts a contactless payment solution to provide a cost-effective and highly affordable
method of transacting.
11. Can businesses register as merchants on MotoPay?
Yes. By joining MotoPay as a merchant, businesses gain access to a vast customer base of over 10
million customers throughout Nigeria, enabling them to expand their reach.
12. Can I reserve an hotel on MotoPoay?
Yes you can! MotoPay allows you to reserve hotels at competitive prices anywhere in Nigeria.
13. Are there any special deals or discounts available for shopping on Motopay?
Yes, Motopay frequently collaborates with merchants to bring exclusive deals and discounts to
its users. Keep an eye out for special promotions, seasonal offers, and flash sales on the app to
enjoy great savings on your purchases.
14.What do I gain from signing up with MotoPay?
You get 1000 Naira welcome alert and merchants get up to 5ooo Naira welcome alert.
15. How can I book flights on MotoPay?
MotoPay allows you to easily book flights to any destination within Nigeria at competitive prices
compared to other airlines by simply navigating to the ‘book flight’ tab on your homepage.
16.How long does it take for funds to be transferred from my MotoPay account
The transfer time from your MotoPay account to your bank account is instant. You can also have
all your banks in one wallet.
17. Can I top up my locked funds?
Yes, You can top up locked funds.
18.Will I get fined if I break my locked funds?
No.

31. Can I borrow money with my friends?
Yes. MotoPay offers a group loan feature enabling borrowing with a minimum of 2 individuals
and a maximum of 20 people as a single entity.
32.What happens if someone defaults on payment?
Payment default entails shared responsibility for all involved parties.
33. How can I apply for a loan on Motopay?
To apply for a loan, follow these steps;
Step 1. Open the Motopay app and navigate to the loan section.
Step 2. Follow the instructions provided to initiate the loan application process.
Step 3. Provide the necessary personal and financial information as requested.
Step 4. Submit your application and wait for the approval process to be completed.
Step 5. Once approved, the loan amount will be credited to your designated account.
34. How long does it take to get approved for a loan on Motopay?
Minimum of 5 mins.
SHOP
35. Who can set up a shop?
Anyone can set up a Shop on MotoPay. MotoPay offers a merchant platform where you can shop
for various products and services online.
36.What are the requirements of setting up a shop?
When setting up a shop, key requirements such as a phone, a BVN, the shop name, category,
official address, phone number, and email address.
37.Do I get a Business Account when I set up a Shop?
Yes, a business wallet will be created.
38.What are the benefits of setting up a shop?
When you open a shop, you and the referrer each receive 5000 Naira.
